titles.title: Telehealth Expansion Act
Telehealth Expansion Act
Telehealth Expansion Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt telehealth services from certain high deductible health plan rules.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Telehealth Expansion Act
This bill exempts high deductible health plans from the requirement of a deductible for telehealth and other remote care services for plan years beginning after 2021.
